Title: Schism (2)
Plot:
Harry and Nikki are called out to a London dogs' home where the naked body of a teenage girl has been found, tortured to death.


It becomes clear that a second girl is being held somewhere, the pathologists find themselves pulled into a world of violence, spies, extremism and cover-ups.
ParentalRatingReason: Horror and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Antonia Campbell-Hughes, Nicholas Jones, Jonathan Guy Lewis, Brian Cowan
